rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0001
rows.name: There's something Cushion wants to drink, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0002
rows.name:
If you're a salvager, you've probably
drunk it before, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a delicious-looking potion that drops
when you defeat or topple an enemy, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0005
rows.name:
They say if you drink it, you'll feel
better in an instant, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But Cushion can't fight, so I've never
had a chance to drink it... mo.
